FAQ / Alpha Trion Protocols / Wave 3 / Characters /

Overlord, Sadistic Phase Sixer

  1. CUSTOM CARD
    Which KO area do you check for the Bot Mode ability?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    Both, a player’s references both players KO area
  2. CUSTOM CARD
    What does it mean to be a Tank and Plane in Bot mode?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    It means that any cards that reference being in Plane or Tank mode are active in both of Overlord’s modes. This means cards like Composite Armor can be put on him in either mode. When you flip a Hull Down in either mode it is active, etc.
  3. CUSTOM CARD
    How does     Hunker Down work with Overlord? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    If he is in Bot mode, you will flip him to Alt mode then complete the card
  4. CUSTOM CARD
    Can I play upgrades or actions with Overlord’s attack ability?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    Yes, any card with exactly one star on it can be played, actions or upgrades.
